QuestionStem: How will the environment shown in the photo change when summer arrives? Select all that apply.

options.AnswerText: B. Water will evaporate from the stream.
D. Snow will continue to fall and form large piles.

CorrectFeedback: When the sun adds energy to the area, the water will heat, melting the snow and making water in the stream and plants become water vapor.
PartiallyCorrectFeedback: Recall how energy from the sun drives different processes in the water cycle.
IncorrectFeedback: Recall how energy from the sun drives different processes in the water cycle.
FinalIncorrectFeedback: When the sun adds energy to the area, the water will heat, melting the snow and making water in the stream and plants become water vapor.
